Warehouse Keeper Hugin: Sure, I spend most of my days bent over my account books, but my job isn't boring at all. If you look at what people put in and take out, you see what is really going on in this town. Things are not always what they seem, my friend. Take care concerning these two names in particular: von Hellman and van Haken. I can tell you no more...
